form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Lankford (for himself and Mr. Kelly) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To expand eligibility for special overtime pay to U.S. Border Patrol agents classified above grade GS–12.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Border Patrol Supervisors Retention Act.

section.header: Establishment of higher rates of regularly scheduled overtime pay for certain U.S. Border Patrol agents
section.text: Section 5550(h) of title 5, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in the subsection heading, by striking GS–12 Border Patrol agents and inserting Border Patrol agents classified from grade GS–12 through GS–15; and
in paragraph (1), by striking a position at grade GS–12 and inserting a position from grade GS–12 through GS–15.
